main event: A bright white object resembling a falling star was observed in Kansas City, Missouri on 6 October 1964.
interesting points: The object appeared to fall from 30 degrees elevation to 10 degrees,It was observed for a duration of approximately 2 seconds,The object became brighter as it approached the horizon and seemed to slow down before disappearing,The report suggests the object could have been a meteor or meteorite,The observation was described as visual with no physical evidence found.
witness description: single observer with a good estimate of reliability
